name: initorcl

stmt.origin: mptrcl(hs0, c0, cinito, c1, ccat, crab(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), weu(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs2), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(hs3)))))))

body.origin:

-| wceq(cinito, cmpt(hs0, ccat, crab(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), weu(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs2), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(hs3))))))))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(InitO ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Cat)

⊣ d(hs0, Cat)

comment: Reverse closure for an initial object: If a class has an initial object, the class is a category. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
